function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Rapid spread of covid-19 due to lack of effective public health response","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid surge in traffic on iomt tech and telemedicine platforms due to covid-19 outbreak","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of telemedicine platforms for screening covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Minimal human contact treatment using telemedicine strategies","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of telemedicine with other technologies","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of drones for public announcements","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of drones for mass temperature screening","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid delivery of medicines and supplies using drones","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of drones for crowd surveillance and disinfection","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the use of drones for delivery","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on drone technology may lead to a reduction in human-to-human interactions, impacting social interactions and community cohesion","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on robot technology may lead to reduced human oversight and care.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High demand for autonomous disinfection robots could lead to shortages and delays in deployment.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential exposure to infected individuals during sample collection and patient support","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of virus transmission through traditional delivery mechanisms","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wearable devices may lead to false alarms or misdiagnosis of covid-19 symptoms, leading to unnecessary panic or burden on healthcare systems.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on wearables for health monitoring may lead to neglect of traditional healthcare practices and face-to-face medical consultations, resulting in delayed or inadequate medical care for non-covid-19 related conditions.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Wearable may not accurately measure respiratory rates, leading to false notifications and undermining user trust.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wearable devices may not accurately capture and report the wearer’s health status, leading to unreliable data.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate data validation leading to false alarms or missed critical symptoms","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overreliance on technology for diagnosis and assessment","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential interruption of supply chains and delivery of wearables due to lockdowns and disruptions","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of mobile applications for covid-19 impact management","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adoption of blockchain technology for covid-19 apps","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sharing verified health and location information among individuals, authorities, and hospitals","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of gis data for covid-19 mapping","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Bluetooth contact tracing for covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of bluetooth for tracking covid-19 spread","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of gps for monitoring covid-19 positive patients","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The app may not accurately determine whether an individual has been exposed to a potential covid-19 patient, leading to false alerts or a lack of necessary alerts","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"False sense of security provided by the voice-detection app for covid-19 screening","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Voice-based covid-19 diagnosis app may not be accurate or reliable","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on ai for disease prediction without human interpretation","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on ai for risk estimation of emerging infections","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on technology for early identification of zoonotic viruses","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prediction of risk of infection, severe symptoms, and treatment outcomes using ai","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ai predictive models may have accuracy limitations and may not always provide accurate predictions for severe cases of covid-19.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Repurposing of ai tools for covid-19 screening and diagnosis may lead to errors and inaccuracies in test results.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Acceleration of testing kit development using ai","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential false positive or false negative results in covid-19 screening due to voice detection technology.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on ai for accurate diagnosis of covid-19 mutations.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"False identification of potential drug treatments for covid-19 through ai analysis.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ai in drug discovery for contagious diseases without thorough validation and testing","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Repurposing existing drugs without sufficient evidence for effectiveness against covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ai in drug discovery may lead to misidentification of potential treatments for covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential over-reliance on ai-driven drug discovery","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Virus binding to host cells via lock and key mechanism","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of experimental verification for predicted virus protein structures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ai and machine learning for modeling virus structures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unidentified mammalian host for sars-cov-2 transmission to humans","category":"Health","confidence":"High"}]}
